infoPlist.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: retrosPiCam needs local network access to connect to the camera.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: retrosPiCam needs access to save captured videos and photos to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: retrosPiCam needs access to save captured videos and photos to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: retrosPiCam needs notification access to alert you when motion is detected.
